ðŸ“œ *Decree from Imperator Visio Maximus*

*Title:* Decree on the Sanctity of the Imperial Name
*Issued:* 2025-06-13

Let it be known across the Empire that the sacred name *US Reliance* shall appear in all communications **without** question mark, typo, or blemish. Any variation, such as *US?Reliance*, shall be considered an act of clerical sabotage and met with immediate correction.

May the Slackus scrolls reflect the true name of the Empire.

*So decrees the Imperator.*
